PerfectNetExp.abs: expounded 论述, expounder 立言, expounded 论述了
propounder 提议者，建议者expounder 解释者，说明者rounder 作圆的人，巡行者

list.abs: they expound & glorify their own doctrines , but as for the doctrines of others , they deprecate them , revile show contempt for them , & disparage them .他们阐述、颂扬自己的教义，但是对于他人的教义，则贬低、辱骂、鄙视、毁谤。
expound是什么意思... ... generally expound ： 广泛地论述 expound elaborate ： 论证阐述 expound elaborate ： 阐明陈述.

basedon the systematical analysis of ball grinding process , the research status of factors having effects on millingand crushing of grinder was expounded emphatically .在概述球磨过程系统分析的基础上，重点论述了影响磨机粉碎效果的有关因素的研究现状。
the demands of PCCP for prestressed wire are expounded emphatically from such aspects as chemical .从化学成分、组织、钢丝的拉拔、微合金化措施等方面重点阐述PCCP对预应力钢丝的要求。
The third part expounds varieties which news media betrays human solicitude at present ., 第三部分阐述了目前新闻传媒对人文关怀的种种背叛.
